attributes.action: Acknowledge the content of The Book 'Wasting Police Time' as an accurate reflection of modern policing and be included as a critical document in the review process
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PC David Copperfield, wrote a book following his immensely successful 'Coppersblog'. Having been 'rubbished' by several High Level Officials as inaccurate, I call on serving Police Officers to support the sacrafice our colleague has made and support this petition. 

Does the blog and book reflect what you do ?

Do you feel that PC Copperfield has said all that needs to be said ?
